usefulItems: ceramic or glass bowl, thermal serving bowl or other large bowl
title: Pork with black bean sauce

ingredients.content: 500 - 600 g pork fillets (approx. 2-3 fillets), trimmed and cut into strips (1 x 10 cm)
½ - 1 long red chilli, deseeded if preferred (optional)
400 g canned unsalted black beans, rinsed and drained
1 tsp palm sugar (1 cm cube), grated
1 bunch broccolini (approx. 180 g), trimmed and cut into thirds
230 g canned bamboo shoots, rinsed and drained (weight is pre-draining)
1 spring onion/shallot, trimmed and thinly sliced, for garnishing
1 - 2 sprigs fresh coriander, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place a ceramic or glass bowl onto mixing bowl lid, then weigh ginger wine and pork into it. Add hoi sin sauce and oil to bowl, stir to combine and set aside.
Place chilli (optional) and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Drain black beans through simmering basket, rinse well and allow to drain. Add 150 g of the drained black beans and all remaining sauce ingredients and cook <b>3 min/100°C/speed 5<b>. Transfer into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl to keep warm. Rinse and dry mixing bowl.
Insert simmering basket, weigh rice into it, then rinse rice until water runs clear.

Place water into mixing bowl, insert simmering basket with rice and cook <b>5 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Place Varoma into position and place pork and marinade into Varoma dish. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Set Varoma aside. Stir rice in simmering basket with spatula, then stir pork in Varoma dish to ensure even cooking. Place Varoma dish back into position.
Insert Varoma tray and place broccolini, bamboo shoots and remaining drained black beans onto it. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>4-6 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>, or until all pork is cooked.
Combine pork with black bean sauce, vegetables and black beans. Serve pork over rice, garnished with spring onion/shallot and coriander.
